name: Name
logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
about_app: HealthBand is an app created for monitoring elderly people, offering doctors real-time access to health data. Our goal is to increase safety and quality of life by facilitating remote monitoring and efficient communication.
congrats_doctor_associated: Congratulations! Your associated doctor is Dr. {name} {surname}!
no_associated_doctor: You don't have an associated doctor yet.
to_save_changes_enter_password: To save changes, please enter your password.
help_content: Here you will find instructions, tips and answers to the most common questions. If you are stuck, read this section or contact support!
password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
help_q1: Where can I check the patient’s status, pulse and temperature?
help_a1: Go to the patient’s profile from your patients list. You will see dedicated sections for pulse, temperature, and general status.
help_q2: Where do I see the patients assigned to me?
help_a2: Tap the "Patients" button in the bottom bar or go to the "Select patient" section from the dashboard.
help_q3: How can I edit my profile information?
help_a3: Go to "Profile" and tap the edit (pencil) button to change your personal details.
help_q4: How can I contact my patients?
help_a4: From the patient’s profile or the "Messages" section, you can quickly start a conversation with any of your patients.
help_q5: How can I set alarms for the patient’s medication?
help_a5: Go to the patient’s profile, open the "Medication Alarms" section, and use the + button to add an alarm for the desired day.
help_q6: How can I change my account password?
help_a6: Go to "Settings" and select "Change password". Follow the instructions in the pop-up window.
help_contact_title: Didn't find what you needed? Contact us!
no_associated_doctor: You do not have an associated doctor at the moment.
health_history_soon: Health history function will be available soon.
emergency_alert_soon: Emergency alert function will be available soon.
profile_soon: Profile function will be available soon.

Are you sure you want to delete this appointment?
phelp_q1: How do I check my pulse?
phelp_a1: Go to the Home screen and tap the 'Pulse' button to view your latest pulse data.
phelp_q2: How do I check my vitals?
phelp_a2: Go to the Home screen and tap the 'Vitals' button to see your recent values.
phelp_q3: How can I set or view medicine alarms?
phelp_a3: Select 'Medicine alarms' from the Home screen to add, edit, or see your medication reminders.
phelp_q4: How can I call my doctor?
phelp_a4: Tap 'Calls' on the Home screen, then choose your doctor to initiate a call.
phelp_q5: How do I send a message to my doctor?
phelp_a5: Go to the 'Messages' tab, select your doctor, and start chatting.
phelp_q6: How can I update my profile information?
phelp_a6: Go to the 'Profile' tab and tap the edit icon to change your personal details.
phelp_q7: How do I select or change my doctor?
phelp_a7: On the Home screen, tap 'Select doctor' and choose your doctor from the list.
phelp_q8: Where do I see my upcoming appointments?
phelp_a8: Go to the 'Appointments' tab to view all your scheduled appointments.
phelp_q9: How do I enable notifications for medicines or messages?
phelp_a9: Allow notifications for the app in your phone settings. You will receive alerts for medicines and messages.
phelp_q10: How do I log out of the app?
phelp_a10: Open the side menu and tap 'Logout' to sign out of your account.
about_text: HealthBand helps you monitor your health and stay connected with your doctor. You can track pulse, temperature, set alarms, communicate and manage appointments easily.
